content: Give me a list of 12 words that end with 'ment'.

Certainly! Here is a list of 12 words that end with "ment":

1. Development
2. Environment
3. Government
4. Investment
5. Agreement
6. Commitment
7. Establishment
8. Improvement
9. Management
10. Replacement
11. Treatment
12. Achievement

I hope this helps! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
